blocks.name: filbcmb
blocks.content: Combine a finite set of lower bounds. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm filbcmb(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wss(c1, cr)), wi(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), w0)))), wrex(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), wral(s0, c0, w0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)

  syld(w3a(wcel(c0, cfn), wne(c0, emptycls), wss(c1, cr)), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), w0)))), wrex(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), wral(s0, c0, w0)))), wrex(hs0, cfn, w3a(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), w0)))), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), w0)))))))

  ssex(c1, cr)
  reex()
  3expia(wcel(c0, cfn), wcel(c1, universe), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), w0)))), wrex(hs0, cfn, w3a(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, cv(hs0), wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), w0)))), wral(s1, cv(hs0), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s2, c1, wi(wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s2)), w0)))))))

blocks.name: fzmul
blocks.content: Membership of a product in a finite interval of integers. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 17-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm fzmul(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn)), wi(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cfz, co(c2, cmul, c1)))))
} = {
  sylbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfz, c1)), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cfz, co(c2, cmul, c1))), w3a(wcel(c3, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfz, c1)), w3a(wcel(c3, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1))))
  elfz1(c0, c1, c3)
  3impa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn), wi(w3a(wcel(c3, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1)), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cfz, co(c2, cmul, c1)))))
  3impd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(c3, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cfz, co(c2, cmul, c1))))
  exp4b(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wcel(c3, cz), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cfz, co(c2, cmul, c1))))
  an32s(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c3, cz), wi(wa(wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1)), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cfz, co(c2, cmul, c1)))))
  sylibrd(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1)), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cfz, co(c2, cmul, c1))), wa(wbr(co(c2, cmul, c0), cle, co(c2, cmul, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, co(c2, cmul, c1))))
  anim12d(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c0), cle, co(c2, cmul, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, co(c2, cmul, c1)))
  adantllr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c2, cn), wi(wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c0), cle, co(c2, cmul, c3))))
  biimpd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c0), cle, co(c2, cmul, c3)))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c2, cn), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c0), cle, co(c2, cmul, c3))))
  syl3an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c2, cn), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c0), cle, co(c2, cmul, c3))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2)))
  zre(c0)
  lemul2(c0, c3, c2)
  adantlll(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c2, cn), wi(wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, co(c2, cmul, c1))))
  biimpd(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(c2, cn)), wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, co(c2, cmul, c1)))
  ancom1s(wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c2, cn), wb(wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, co(c2, cmul, c1))))
  3expa(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn), wb(wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, co(c2, cmul, c1))))
  syl3an(wcel(c3, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cn), wb(wbr(c3, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, co(c2, cmul, c1))), wcel(c3, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2)))
  zre(c3)
  zre(c1)
  jca(wcel(c2, cn), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c2))
  nnre(c2)
  nngt0(c2)
  lemul2(c3, c1, c2)
  imp(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(c2, cn), wb(wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cfz, co(c2, cmul, c1))), wa(wbr(co(c2, cmul, c0), cle, co(c2, cmul, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, co(c2, cmul, c1)))))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wi(wcel(c2, cn), wb(wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cfz, co(c2, cmul, c1))), wa(wbr(co(c2, cmul, c0), cle, co(c2, cmul, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, co(c2, cmul, c1))))))
  syl11(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wcel(c2, cn), wb(wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cfz, co(c2, cmul, c1))), wa(wbr(co(c2, cmul, c0), cle, co(c2, cmul, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, co(c2, cmul, c1)))), wcel(c2, cz))
  syl6(wcel(c2, cz), w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c3, cz)), wb(wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cfz, co(c2, cmul, c1))), wa(wbr(co(c2, cmul, c0), cle, co(c2, cmul, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, co(c2, cmul, c1)))), w3a(wcel(co(c2, cmul, c0), cz), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c1), cz), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), cz)))
  3anim123d(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c0), cz), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c1), cz), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), cz))
  ex(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c0, cz), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c0), cz))
  zmulcl(c2, c0)
  ex(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c1), cz))
  zmulcl(c2, c1)
  ex(wcel(c2, cz), wcel(c3, cz), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), cz))
  zmulcl(c2, c3)
  3coml(wcel(co(c2, cmul, c0), cz), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c1), cz), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), cz), wb(wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(co(c2, cmul, c0), cfz, co(c2, cmul, c1))), wa(wbr(co(c2, cmul, c0), cle, co(c2, cmul, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, co(c2, cmul, c1)))))
  elfz(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(c2, cmul, c0), co(c2, cmul, c1))
  nnz(c2)
}
